sentences.en: extremists on the periphery of the animal rights movement
sentences.cn: 处于动物权利运动边缘的极端分子

sentences.en: Geographically, the UK is on the periphery of Europe, while Paris is at the heart of the continent.
sentences.cn: 从地理位置上讲，英国处于欧洲边缘，而巴黎却位于欧洲大陆的中心位置。

sentences.en: Geographically, the UK is on the periphery of Europe.
sentences.cn: 从地理位置上讲，英国处于欧洲边缘。

sentences.en: In the periphery of the retina, ganglion cells are relatively few in number.
sentences.cn: 在视网膜的边缘区节细胞相当少.

sentences.en: industrial development on the periphery of the town
sentences.cn: 城镇周边地区工业的发展

sentences.en: It does not concern things that huddle on the periphery of life.
sentences.cn: 哲学所关注的不是堆挤在生活表面上的事物.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, Greece's problems have raised concerns of contagion across the euro - zone periphery.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 希腊的问题也引发了对危机可能蔓延至整个欧元区的担忧.

sentences.en: Other animals were depicted on the periphery of the group.
sentences.cn: 其他动物在群像的外围加以修饰.

sentences.en: Perching on the periphery of every orchestra is a percussion player.
sentences.cn: 坐在每支管弦乐队外围的是打击乐演奏者.
肺动脉向周围逐渐变细.

sentences.en: Taste buds are concentrated at the tip and rear of the tongue and around its periphery.
sentences.cn: 味蕾集中于舌尖、舌根和舌头两侧。

sentences.en: The blades at its periphery throw off air centrifugally in a direction following the rotation.
sentences.cn: 轮周叶片将空气沿着转动方向抛离轴心.

sentences.en: The ideas are also expressed by minor poets on the periphery of the movement.
sentences.cn: 该运动外围一些不大出名的诗人也表达了这些观点.

sentences.en: The periphery of the retina is very sensitive to motion.
sentences.cn: 视网膜的外围对运动非常敏感.

sentences.en: These philosophers are always with us, struggling in the periphery to try to tell us something.
sentences.cn: 这些哲学家总是有的, 他们在我们周围喋喋不休地企图告诉我们一点东西.

sentences.en: What lies in the periphery of simplicity is de ? nitely not peripheral.
sentences.cn: 简单的周边事物决非无关紧要.

words.tran_cn: 外围，[地理]边缘；圆周；圆柱体表面

trans.tran_cn: 边缘，圆周，外围，边缘地带
